001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.util.List;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
007import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
008
009public class Attribute<T> implements Feature<T>, ObjectFactory<T> {
010        
011        private List<? extends Marker> markers;
012        private T value;
013        private boolean loaded;
014        private Object key;
015        private boolean required;
016        private Object[] exclusiveWith;
017        private boolean isDefault;
018        private String description;
019        
020        public Attribute(
021                        Object key, 
022                        boolean isDefault, 
023                        boolean required, 
024                        T defaultValue, 
025                        String description, 
026                        Object... exclusiveWith) {
027                this.key = key;
028                this.isDefault = isDefault;
029                this.required = required;
030                this.value = defaultValue;
031                this.description = description;
032                this.exclusiveWith = exclusiveWith;             
033        }
034                
035        @Override
036        public Object getKey() {
037                return key;
038        }
039        
040        @Override
041        public T getValue() {
042                return value; 
043        }
044        
045        @Override
046        public boolean isLoaded() {
047                return loaded;
048        }
049        
050        @Override
051        public List<? extends Marker> getMarkers() {
052                return markers;
053        }
054
055        @Override
056        public void load(ObjectLoader loader, Map<?,?> source, URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers) {
057                if (source.containsKey(getKey())) {
058                        for (Object ek: exclusiveWith) {
059                                if (source.containsKey(ek)) {
060                                        throw new ConfigurationException("Features '" + getKey() + " and " + ek + " are mutually exclusive", markers);                                  
061                                }
062                        }
063                        this.markers = Util.getMarkers(source, getKey());
064                        value = create(loader, source.get(getKey()), base, progressMonitor, this.markers);                                              
065                        loaded = true;
066                } else if (isRequired()) {
067                        throw new ConfigurationException("Missing required feature: " + getKey(), markers);
068                }               
069        }       
070        
071        /**
072         * This implementation casts config to the target type. It can be used where not special conversion is required, e.g. config is a String and feature type is String.
073         * @param loader
074         * @param config
075         * @param base
076         * @param progressMonitor
077         * @param marker
078         * @return
079         */
080        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
081        @Override
082        public T create(ObjectLoader loader, Object config, URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers) {
083                return (T) config;
084        }
085
086        public Object[] getExclusiveWith() {
087                return exclusiveWith;
088        }
089        
090        @Override
091        public boolean isRequired() {
092                return required;
093        }
094        
095        @Override
096        public boolean isDefault() {
097                return isDefault;
098        }
099
100        @Override
101        public String getDescription() {
102                return description;
103        }
104}
